# Tessera

Welcome to Tessera! This is a terminal based password manager. It stores all passwords and keys locally on your hard drive. This project as made for [Hackvault (by Hackclub)](https://hackvault.hackclub.com) Find mroe details [here](https://github.com/TheAwesomeAJ/Tessera/wiki):

- **Made by:** TheAwesomeAJ
- **Made for:** Hackvault
